about_the_game:
Tsumugi is a Vtuber active in the virtual space of Unreally. She is on an adventure in a candy world, searching for her beloved cream puffs. One day, while hunting for cream puffs, Tsumugi suddenly gets caught in a rift in the space. When she wakes up, she finds herself face-to-face with a being that looks just like her.

The being introduces itself as "Mashirochrome" and reveals that it was born from Tsumugi's negative emotions. Chrome was born from Tsumugi's strong desire to eat cream puffs but lacks the ability to taste them. To regain the ability to taste cream puffs, Chrome needs to collect five Crystal Cream Puffs of different colors.

Determined to help Chrome taste the sweetness of cream puffs, Tsumugi sets off on an adventure to find these Crystal Cream Puffs, which are said to be located at crystal gate-like structures. "I'll show you the deliciousness of cream puffs, Chrome-chan!" Tsumugi declares enthusiastically, and Chrome eagerly awaits her success. What will be the outcome of Tsumugi's adventure?

Features
Diverse Jump Actions: Players control Tsumugi, utilizing a variety of jump actions to progress through the adventure. With actions like jumping, sliding, and climbing, the game offers an exciting play experience.

Fully Voiced Dialogues: The story is enriched by fully voiced dialogues between characters. The interactions between Tsumugi and Chrome, as well as other characters, immerse players in the narrative.

Fantasy Adventure in a Virtual Space: Set in the virtual world of Unrealie, which features candy landscapes and fantastical scenery, players explore various locations throughout their journey.

Collect Cream Puffs and Uncover Mysteries: As Tsumugi collects cream puffs, she also unravels various mysteries. Gathering Crystal Cream Puffs unlocks new areas to explore.

A Story of Growth and Friendship: The game presents a touching story of Tsumugi's growth and the development of her friendships. Watch as she overcomes challenges and strengthens her bonds.

Tsumugi's adventure invites players into an unknown world. To bring the deliciousness of cream puffs to Chrome, let's embark on this exciting journey!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4130 or Core™ i5-3470 or AMD FX™-6100
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050ti
  • Storage: 3 GB の空き容量 GB available space

short_description: A sweet and poignant cream puff adventure to save another self who has lost their sense of taste. An emotional story you won't want to miss until the very end.
